case_circumstances: A decapitated body was found west of Corey Highway, north of Carroll Highway in section 22 of Blissfield Township, Lenawee County, MI. The body of a light skinned male (unsure if he is Caucasian or Hispanic) was found face down with a layer of snow covering most of the body. There was no clothing on the body. Both hands and head were missing. No scars or tattoos present. There was mild decomposition with active and abundant maggot infestation. Per the forensic entomology report, fly colonization occured on the body sometime between September 19, 1997 and October 4, 1997.
fingerprints: Fingerprint information is currently not available
dental: Dental information / charting is currently not available
documents: There are currently no documents available for this case.
